title: Train Fault on East West Line causing Delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kereta di Laluan Timur Barat Menyebabkan Kelewatan
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக தாமதம்

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #JurongEast towards #OutramPark are now operating normally.
[EWL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #JurongEast to #OutramPark towards #PasirRis due to train fault.
